duties_responsibilities.duty: Play an integral role in the research process, join a focused industry group, and work closely with Analysts.
Provide quantitative support for industry- and company-specific research and assist with field research.
Work in small teams to cover a group of stocks, collect industry data, and provide expertise in a sector that helps clients decide where to invest.
Write reports and communicate findings, interact directly with covered company management (CEOs, CFOs), and discuss research findings with Sales & Trading associates and institutional clients.

education_certification.credential: Current enrollment in a Bachelor’s degree program (Finance/Accounting degree preferred) with graduation date of December 2024 or Spring 2025
